content.rendered:
Directed by Sarath Menon

Written by Sarath Menon

Star Shane Nigam (Sidharth). Suraj Venjaramoodu ((as Suraaj Venjarammoodu)). Shine Tom Chacko (Jomy Mathew). Inis Ali (Jins Eleppan). Sunil Anatappan (Auto Ratheesh). Surya Aneesh (Priya Jomy). Ayush Annesh (Appu). Anoop (Constable #2). Hena Chandran (Stella Baby). Bitto Davis (SI Famous Francis). Rema Devi (TV Reporter). James Eliya (Baby Mathew). Harikrishnan K.R. (HariKuttan). Sudhi Koppa (Jins Varghese). Manoj (Constable #3). Anand Mukund (Chimban). Anandhu Mukundan (Chimban (as Chimban)). Nandakumar (Security). Narayani (Kuttan’s Grandmother). Sona Olickal (Sruthi). Manikandan Pallippat (Peter). Merin Jose Pottackal (Merin). Pranav Pradeep (Chimban Friend #2). Praveen (Constable #1). Geethi Sangeetha (Kuttan’s Mother). Imran Sayd (Karthi). Muhammed Shalu (Prince). Sreerekhaa (Radha). Syam (Rijo). Kabir T.K. (Kabir). Joby George Thadathil (Principal). Antony Thekkekkara (Thomas). Neha Unnikrishnan (Nimmy). Ansan V.A. (Chimban Friend #3). Ralphy Vellattukara (Cleetus). Akhil Venu (Chimban Friend #1). Binji Venugopal (Bar Manager). Vysakh (Constable #4). Anet Wilson (Mary Miss)

Language Malayalam

Producers Joby George Thadathil

Production Goodwill Entertainments
